title: Christ Liveth In Me
author: Daniel Webster Whittle (1840-1901)
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Once far from God and dead in sin,
No light my heart could see;
But in God's Word the light I found,
v2: As rays of light from yonder sun,
The flow'rs of earth set free,
So life and light and love come forth
v3: As lives the flow'r within the seed,
As in the cone the tree,
So, praise the Christ of truth and grace,
v4: With longing all my heart is filled,
That like Him I may be,
As on the wondrous thought I dwell
c1: Christ liveth in me, Christ liveth in me;
Oh! what a salvation this, That Christ liveth in me.
